review_data.title: Tolles Degustationserlebnis
review_data.content: Die Bier Degustation war echt ein tolles und informatives Erlebnis. Pierre, der Chef-Brauer, war sehr kompetent und konnte uns auf...More

review_data.title: Small brewery. Original beers.
review_data.content: It is probably real craft brewery, that offers quite a number of original beers. Worth fo short visit to drink couple beers. Almost no food choise.

review_data.title: Looking for a brewpub? If so, this is a must!
review_data.content: Previously this place used to be a small local restaurant. The touch of the previous restaurant is still there but now with a good variety of taps and the brewery that is visible just behind a glass wall. With wooden walls and tables, this brew...More

review_data.title: Beer geeks - go here!
review_data.content: We are self-described beer geeks in Zurich on vacation, and decided to check out the only local brewer we could find with a on-site pub/tasting room. These guys have a wide variety of styles - we tried the ne ipa, the pale ale, and the...More

review_data.title: Nette gemütliche Bar mit Craft Beer
review_data.content: Urige Kneipe mit eigener Brauerei. Schöne Auswahl bis zu 10 Bieren, alle selbst gemacht und in all Richtungen somit ist...More

review_data.title: Delicious craft beers
review_data.content: Brewery with tasting room in the hip part of Zurich. Has a nice outdoor area and very friendly owners.

review_data.title: Excellent beers, friendly staff (owners), cool location
review_data.content: Good selection of self-brewed beers, some snacks and other drinks available as well. They also offer brewing-events! Great place.

review_data.title: Esperienza da non perdere
review_data.content: Avevo sentito parlare di questa nuova birreria per cui di passaggio per Zurigo ci siamo andati io, la mia famiglia...More

review_data.title: Great brewpub!
review_data.content: The place is a little jewel in the city! Very cosy, great service and amazing beer. I appreciated the water fountain and the clean restroom.

review_data.title: Great bartender Matz. Tap beer selections only
review_data.content: Having heard of a new addition to the craft beer scene, I headed over to check out the Bierlab. Located near Werd and Wiedikon the place is open Thursday-Saturday 17.00-24.00. Bierlab is a nice, cozy spot in a rather laid back neighborhood. There is a...More

review_data.title: Brewpub mit viel Charme
review_data.content: Das Bierlab ist echt ein Besuch wert. Sehr freundliche und kompetente Gastgeber, hübsches Interieur und vor allem: GUTES BIER! Wer...More
